data.name: ViRo - Vi Rose
data.detailed_description:
Did you hear the hot gossip around ViRo Playspace? Word on the street is that a certain purple haired little minx has totally been playing tonsil hockey with the boss lady. Rumor has it that Vi Rose made Vex Ruby her little plaything and she’s planning to tag team some lucky person in the club soon!

Are you ready to get hyped? That lucky person is you.

That’s what you’re about to experience in "Fun with Vi Rose", the latest release from ViRo Playspace. You’ll find yourself in the presence of our two leading ladies who get down and dirty with each other and then take turns playing with you. Vi totally runs the show, with Vex strapped up in a sex swing, ready and waiting to have her fun with you.

Vi Rose finally makes her debut in ViRo Playspace.

data.short_description: Vi Rose finally makes her debut in ViRo Playspace. She brings fun and fantasy while teasing Vex Ruby in her sexy swing.[/img]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIdia 960 GTX
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR and Non-VR capable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 980 Ti GTX
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC depicts oral sex, bisexual interactions, and intercourse.  Views are from a first person perspective.
